hs_code_classification.hs_code_description: Other wooden furniture, not of a kind used in offices.

additional_duties.name: Section 301 Tariff
additional_duties.reason: The product is manufactured in China, subject to U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods under Section 301.

Products subject to additional tariffs under Section 301 must be properly declared.
